answers.answer: Hi, Thanks for the query. Hypoglycemia can cause decreased movements of the baby. Decreased movements a definite cause for concern. Kindly meet a physician with fbs and ppbs for dose adjustments of ur diet. Have a great day.

question: I am 17 weeks pregnant, and I have Gestational Diabetes and High blood pressure. I have been on a low carb Diabetic diet for a week now, and have noticed some decrease in the movement of my baby. Two weeks ago I was feeling alot of flutter movements and now I barely feel any movement. I guess my question is, can my diet affect the movement of my baby. Thanks in advance for any advise.
title: Need advise
